entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening then light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
